    def process_line(self, line):
        temp_df = []
        for key in self.decode_file:
            data = line[self.decode_file[key]['position']-1: self.decode_file[key]['position'] + self.decode_file[key]['length']-1]
            data = data.strip()
            temp_df.append(data)
        return temp_df
